heroContent: I'm a web developer who enjoys creating interactive, user-friendly and responsive websites. Check out some of my work below!
content:
In 2015, I recieved my B.ASc in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Toronto and am currently employed as a full-time HVAC Design Engineer.

Since my university days, I have always been dabbling into programming. I have done work on embedded systems, mobile apps and even game development. Eventually, I tried web development, realized that I enjoyed it and have spent a lot of time learning about various full-stack technologies.

I am currently pursuing a career change into the world of web development. I am passionate, hard-working, eager to learn and believe that I can provide a valuable contribution to any team.

Please feel free to contact me below. I am currently open to and would love to discuss any opportunities.
